Display_Partial: EPD_13IN3K_Display_Part(UBYTE *Image, UWORD x, UWORD y, UWORD w, UWORD l)

Notes: The function EPD_13IN3K_Display only accepts a single image, assumed to be 'black'. The EPD_13IN3K_Init_4GRAY and EPD_13IN3K_4GrayDisplay functions mention gray, but as per instructions, 'gray' is treated as part of the 'black' channel. EPD_13IN3K_color_Base and EPD_13IN3K_4GrayDisplay were categorized under Display_Misc due to their specific purposes for handling color and grayscale display.
